text: wkyf 'akhaf awthankm wa'antum la takhafun rabiy aladhi khlqkm, wakhalaq awthankm alty ashrktmwha maeah fi alebadt, min ghyr hujat lakum ealaa dhlk? fa'aya alfryqyn: fariq almushrikin wafariq almwhdyn 'ahaqu baltmanynt walslamt wal'amn min eadhab allh? 'iin kuntum taelamun sidq ma 'aqul fakhbrwny
